title: Caged Heat
description: A lost and failed pilot. A wonderful piece about avenging Russian police cop with anger issues let loose on Los Angeles.
starring: Trevor Slattery, Priscilla Everhart, Rick Hawkins
altHero: Trevor Slattery in suit and aviators shooting a gun
alt1: a red GTS with license plate “KGB COP”
alt4: a monkey in a winter earflap hat drinking some vodka
